Improvements.Improvement: Extract the sub-session creation logic to a separate method
Improvements.Description: The method `setSessionPayload` is lengthy and handles multiple responsibilities. It would be more readable and maintainable if the sub-session creation logic inside the loop was extracted to a separate method.

Improvements.Improvement: Add error handling for version mismatch
Improvements.Description: The method currently returns false if the version does not match the `SESSION_VERSION`. It would be helpful to throw an exception in this case to provide more details about the error.
